name: Bearmit Crab
description: The Bearmit Crab is characterized by its strong natural armor and a robust physical presence. It has a distinctive shell that allows it to blend into rocky environments, resembling a pile of stones when motionless.
memorable: Its ability to render melee weapons unusable through its Viscid Shell ability makes it challenging for fighters to engage in close combat.
goals: It typically lurks in ambush, waiting to strike at unsuspecting prey, leveraging its False Appearance to remain undetected.
relations: It may be encountered near water bodies or rocky coastal areas and could be seen as a territorial creature against other aquatic or land-based predators.
environment: Usually found in rocky coastal areas or near bodies of water.
strengths: Resistance to bludgeoning damage enhances its durability, while its grappling claw attacks provide control over foes.
weaknesses: Slow swimming speed compared to its walking speed limits its mobility in water.
attacks: Makes claw and bite strikes, with the ability to grapple and restrain targets through its powerful claws.
most_powerful_ability: Viscid Shell interrupts melee attacks, potentially immobilizing attackers by making their weapons unusable.
senses: It has Keen Smell, granting advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell, making it effective for detecting hidden creatures.
skills: Possesses good perception skills with a bonus of +3, granting it decent awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Able to render attackers' weapons stuck to its shell with Viscid Shell.
Can perform multiattacks for heightened offensive capability.
False Appearance capability allows it to ambush effectively.
High strength indicates significant melee power.
Average dexterity and wisdom for a creature of its type.
